product_name: Surftech Marisa Miller Stand Up Paddleboard - 10'
long_description: A 10 ft. board designed for women, the Surftech Marisa Miller Stand Up Paddleboard brings a stable, fun design to local flatwater and light surf. Designed by Randy French in collaboration with model Marissa Miller, this SUP was made with women in mind. 10 ft. length offers easy maneuverability, and a scant 22 lb. weight makes transport highly manageable. Rounded pintail and 3-fin design tracks well in flat water and handles rolling waves with ease. High-quality, lightweight epoxy and fiberglass board features a sandwich construction that provides a great combination of performance and durability. Integrated deck pad provides exceptional grip and reduces foot fatigue. Center handle makes transporting your Surftech Marissa MIller Stand Up Paddleboard a breeze.
short_description: A 10 ft. board designed for women, the Surftech Marisa Miller Stand Up Paddleboard brings a stable, fun design to local flatwater and light surf.
